name: Chem-Words 6: Substances and Solutions
description:
This FREE application allows a student to review and practice the recall of 25 terms and definitions relationg to substances and solution in chemistry. The terms are presented in two screens - one with 12 terms and one with 13 terms. The terms are presented on each screen in a shuffled arrangement. The definition appears at the bottom of the screen and the player must select the correct match.     There is a study screen for each set of terms which the student can review at first and make a list of the terms and definitions for studying. Some of the terms are actually mathematical formulas.

    After completing the two screens of tile matching, the user is presented with a score report which shows if each level was completed and what the accuracy was. The accuracy is based on the number of correct answers out of the total number of selections made.
    This app works fine with Android versions 5.0 through 10.0. There is also a Windows version available.
This app is offered totally free of charge and does not require a registration. There are no ads and no permissions needed.
The internet is not needed.  This app does not collect any information at all.
It is a free app and is not be sold for profit. Search for "Richard Carman" or "rtcgames" on sites where you find Android apps. Send questions and comments to rtcarman47@gmail.com
